alert.note: Alert for Claiborne (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 16 at 5:55PM CDT until June 16 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... East central Tensas Parish in northeastern Louisiana... Central Claiborne County in southwestern Mississippi... * Until 700 PM CDT. * At 555 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles southeast of Newellton, or 8 miles northeast of St. Joseph, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Port Gibson around 625 PM CDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
